@paraggawde_21 @andrewakagawa @github @Netlify You can run builds on @Netlify just like you would locally, so if you use @nuxt_js, you can use build with @vuejs and then serve things directly from Netlify. You'll get all the CI and deployment workflow without needing to maintain any server. https://t.co/f3Is3oriab
